description:
PANIRA is a non profit clinic offering medical services as a walk in clinic providing Express Care, Family Medicine, and Wellness Care in the following:

* Common Illnesses - allergies/hay fever, sinus infections, cough, cold/flu/sore throat, ear infections, pink eye/stye, bladder infections
* Minor Injuries - abrasions, sprains/strains, minor cuts/burns
* Procedures - simple lacerations, ear wax removal, splinter removal, wart removal, staples/suture removal
* Testing and Screening - strep throat, TB testing, urinalysis, pregnancy, mononucleosis
* Wellness Services - setanus vaccine, smoking cessation, etc.
* Physicals - pre-employment, sport, college, school, drug testing
* Skin and Hair Conditions - simple, abcess, cold sores, skin infections, sunburn, shingles, itchy skin, impetigo, hives/rash, ringworm, head lice, athletes foot


###COL###
name: PANIRA HEALTHCARE CLINIC, INC.
